Struct template has_param<named_parameter_combine< NP, Rest >, Keyword>

boost::nfp::has_param<named_parameter_combine< NP, Rest >, Keyword>

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/test/utils/named_params.hpp>

template<typename NP, typename Rest, typename Keyword> 
struct has_param<named_parameter_combine< NP, Rest >, Keyword> : public mpl::or_< is_same< NP::id, Keyword::id >::type, has_param< Rest, Keyword >::type >
{
};
